EmailTemplate.description: This is the standard email template to be used when sending a notification to an Alternative Approver that a Timesheet has been submitted and is awaiting approval
EmailTemplate.name: Standard Email - Timesheet - Alternative Approver - Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c} Timesheets to Approve
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Alternative_Approver_First_Name__c},
You have received this notification because you are the nominated secondary Approver for timesheets in the absence of a primary Approver response.
The cut off for timesheet approval is 5.30pm Monday.
Please click below to view and approve/reject all {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c} timesheets for employees who worked last week.
{!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Alternative_Approver_Current_Link_Token__c}
If you require any assistance, please contact your {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c} Consultant or {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Timesheet_Support__c} on {!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Timesheet_Support_Contact__c}.
Yours Sincerely,
{!tc9_et__Timesheet__c.tc9_et__Payment_Entity__c}
